attributes.action: Can I transfer to the universities in UK?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr. Gordon Brown,

My name is Bobir Musakhodjaev. I am from Uzbekistan. I am a member of
Liberal-democratic party of Uzbekisan. Now I am studying at Gwangju
Institute of Science and Technology for M.S. degree. Can I transfer to
the Universities in UK to study for M.S. degree?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
